original_text: And the bronze altar that was before the Lord he removed from the front of the house, from the place between his altar and the house of the Lord, and put it on the north side of his altar.
korean_text: 또 여호와의 앞 곧 성전 앞에 있던 놋제단을 새 제단과 여호와의 성전 사이에서 옮겨다가 그 제단 북쪽에 그것을 두니라

sentences.original_text: And the bronze altar that was before the Lord
he removed from the front of the house
from the place between his altar and the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제단과 주의 성전 사이의 그 장소에서

sentences.original_text: and put it on the north side of his altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그의 제단 북쪽에 두었습니다
